column5: just wondering if anyone has tried sharon creek yet for crappies? Is it ice free yet? thanks

i drove by there on tuesday.  there is fishable open water on both roads.  there was one guy fishing but i didnt stop to ask if he was having any luck.  there was still a layer of slushy looking ice covering most of the water, but it is definitaly fishable and with these warm temps it should be wide open pretty soon.
